mapper.select: select (select value from sys_parameter sp where sp.code ='HOSP_INSURE_NATION_INFO' and sp.hosp_code=a.hosp_code limit 1) as yljgdm, b.id as ssmxlsh, a.profile_id as hzjgnwyid, a.id as jzlsh, '1' as hzlxdm, a.name as xm, a.gender_code as xbdm, '' as xbmc, a.age as nl, '' as dzsqdbh, a.in_dept_id as ksdm, a.in_dept_name as ksmc, a.in_ward_id as bqmc, '' as bfh, a.bed_name as bch, '' as rjssbz, b.`rank` as sslx, b.oper_disease_icd9 as sslx, b.oper_disease_name as ssczmc, b.in_disease_icd10 as ssqzd, '' as sshzd, b.oper_plan_time as sskssj, b.oper_end_time as ssjssj, b.doctor_id as ssysbm, b.doctor_name as ssysxm, b.assistant_id1 as ssysz1bm, b.assistant_name1 as ssysz1xm, b.assistant_id2 as ssysz2bm, b.assistant_name2 as ssysz2xm, b.ana_id1 as mzysbm, b.ana_name1 as mzysxm, b.ana_code as mzfsdm, '' as mzfsmc, b.heal_code as qkyhdj, b.oper_dept_id as ssjbh, b.`rank` as ssjbdm, '' as jrwmc, '' as sstwdm, b.content as ssgcms, '' as sssbz, '' as pfxdms, '' as ssqkms, '' as cxl, '' as syl, '' as sxl, '' as sqyy, '' as szyy, '' as sxfybz, b.qx_nurse_name as qxhsxm, b.qx_nurse_id as qxhsbm, b.xh_nurse_name as xthsxm, b.xh_nurse_id as xthsbm, '' as ssmbbwmc, '' as ssjczff, null as ssjczcs, b.notched_code as ssqklbdm, '' as ssgc, '' as ylclmc, '' as ylclsm, '' as fzbw, '1' as validflag, a.crte_time as appetime, a.crte_time as modifytime, a.crte_id as modifytcode, a.crte_name as modifytname from inpt_visit a join oper_info_record b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.id = b.visit_id where b.crte_time >= date(#{startTime}) and b.crte_time <= date(#{endTime}) and a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and b.hosp_code =#{hospCode}
